mapper.select: SELECT qb.id, qb.chinese_name, qb.english_name, (SELECT name FROM user where id = qb.create_by_id limit 1) as 'create_by_name', qb.short_name, qb.question_type, qb.grade FROM question_bank qb WHERE id IN ( SELECT question_id from competition_question_bank where contest_id = #{contestId} )

select t3.id, t3.short_name, t3.chinese_name, t3.grade, t3.question_type, t3.create_by_name, t3.create_time, t3.`status`, t1.question_id, t1.contest_id, t4.question_id, t4.user_id, t4.first_ac, t4.number_of_attempts from question_bank t3 inner JOIN competition_question_bank t1 on t1.contest_id = #{contestId} and t3.id = t1.question_id LEFT JOIN ac_contest_question t4 on t4.user_id = #{userId} and t4.question_id = t3.id and t4.contest_id = #{contestId}
